name: Falling Upward
description:
Originally this game was developed for a Hungarian End of the World game competition in 2011.  See the original version here: http://users.atw.hu/istvanszalontai/felhajtas/felhajtas.php

Story:

The end of the world is coming which is an approaching negative gravity. Tie down all buildings in the city before the falling upward reaches them. Finally run into the townhouse the get safety underneath its shelter. 

Controls:

WASD and mouse.

Planned remaining tasks:

  • adding sounds and title music
  • some bugfixes
  • stars on the night sky
